11.content: One of the beauties of Final Fantasy VII is about to undergo a humiliating experience they won't soon forget. But who is the (un)lucky lady?
11.title: Final Fantasy VII

choices: A poor decision on her part
111.content:
Tifa Lockhart, renowned for her mastery of martial arts as much as her beauty, is nothing if not a formidable woman. Strong and caring, with a loyal and fierce demeanor, she strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies and inspires hope in her allies. She inspires a great deal more than that in those attracted to women.

Tifa knows full well that she has a particularly well endowed body, and isn't afraid to acknowledge it. Of course, this doesn't mean she wants to go around showing it off to anybody interested in seeing it. Still, if wearing her short black skirt and tight white top meant a few more tips while working at her bar, she wasn't going to let herself get too bothered. Just so long as nobody saw anything they weren't supposed to.

Little did Tifa know, plenty of people were about to see exactly that. It all began as the result of-
111.title: Tifa Lockhart

choices: Aeris, employing the use of powerful manipulation materia.
Yuffie, who had made "alterations" to Tifa's clothing without her knowledge.
An unknown assailant, who had set up a false warrant for her arrest.
1111.content:
In retrospect, Tifa should have been more prepared for finding herself the target of a mean prank. While the fighter couldn't control the fact that she had an appealing figure and face, she knew that such a thing could engender envy and resentment in others. The poorly hidden looks thrown her way, looks of lust and envy, sometimes both, were no stranger to Tifa, and in Midgar especially she knew she stood out from the crowd. Still, she was an accomplished martial artist, and she figured she'd simply break anybody in half if they tried anything funny.

Unfortunately, Tifa hadn't anticipated falling victim to a clever trap, one that had been carefully planned for quite a while. The simple ones thought up in the heat of the moment or that involved blatant tactics were easy to avoid, but a carefully crafted plan was another beast altogether. Little did Tifa know, she'd earned the enmity of someone capable of such a clever prank. When they were done with her, the fighter's reputation and self-respect would be in tatters.

Meanwhile, Tifa blissfully went about her day, completely unaware of the nightmare about to befall her. In a few scant minutes, however, she would find herself hopelessly ensnared in the trap of-
1111.title: A prank

choices: Gave her complete control over Tifa's movements.
Made Tifa's clothing begin to shrink.
Flooded Tifa's mind and body with extreme arousal.
11111.content:
Even with her bright pink dress and striking features, Aeris had grown up in the slums of Midgar, and knew how to blend in with her surroundings. Keeping an eye on Tifa without being noticed proved trivial, much to the flower girl's delight. A selection of materia procured specifically for the task at hand were sitting at the ready, and all that was left was for Tifa to make it to where Aeris was hoping she'd go.

A smile played across Aeris's features as Tifa made her way towards the market stalls, one of the busiest places in the slums, always bustling with activity and all kinds of people. Perfect.

Aeris reached into her bag, wrapping her hand around the first smooth orb of materia she planned to use. Her Ancient blood allowed Aeris to utilize materia in much more sophisticated and powerful ways than the average person, though she kept this little gift secret. Tifa was almost certainly unaware of this fact, meaning she would be just as surprised and unable to explain what was going on as Aeris activated a materia that-
11111.title: Aeris, employing the use of powerful manipulati...

111112.content: The flower girl trailed Tifa as innocently as she could, doing her best to blend in and keep out of sight. She'd been waiting until the time was optimal, and soon enough it was. Once Tifa was out in the open, moving between the aisles of assorted vendors, Aeris allowed herself a thin smile, passed her hand over the orb in her possession, whispered an inaudible chant, and the magic took immediate effect, exerting its influence on...
111112.title: Made Tifa's clothing begin to shrink.

11121.content:
"I can't believe..." Tifa's voice wavered, even though she was the only person in the room, or even the bar. She paced around the small storage room in the back of 7th Heaven, clenching and un-clenching her fists as her heart hammered in her chest. "I can't believe I'm going through with this."

It had been Jessie's idea. It was always Jessie's idea. 7th Heaven was already a front for AVALANCHE, and it hadn't been the first time she had brought up using Tifa's...assets to make money. But times were hard for the AVALANCHE crew right now. The reactor bombing had raised their profile quite a bit and put Shinra on edge. It had already been hard enough to move around and get supplies, but now it was nearly impossible. The few smugglers that were willing to work with them still had doubled, or in some cases_ _tripled their prices. Add to that Cloud's fees and AVALANCHE was broke.

Jessie's usual joking suggestions were now desperate begging. She badgered Tifa for several days, but what finally broke her were Wedge's puppy-dog eyes as he told her he didn't have the gil to get his gun fixed after a nasty brawl with a monster on a neighborhood watch patrol.

So she relented, but on one condition; Jessie had to get Biggs, Wedge, Cloud, and Barret out of Sector 7 for the night. She could handle her usual patrons. Hell, they already propositioned her practically nightly, offering hundreds, sometimes thousands of gil (that she doubted existed) to take her clothes off. But there was no way she could endure the humiliation of exposing herself for money if Cloud, Barret, and the rest of the gang were there.

So Jessie concocted a wild goose chase and left with the crew that morning. Marlene was spending the night at a friend's house, and now Tifa was preparing to to spend the night tending bar in the nude after spending the afternoon posting flyers advertising the one-night-only event.
11121.title: Naked Bartending (FF7R)

111211.content:
The clock in the bar rang the hour and Tifa jumped, pulling her arms close to her self, reflexively shielding her body. She wanted to run. To keep the bar closed for the night and just hide.

"No!" Tifa slapped her cheeks, psyching herself up. "They're all counting on me. I have to do this." Her wavering voice belied the false confidence of her words.

First, she removed her studded gloves and slid the softer, longer gloves underneath them off. She then put her fighting gauntlets back on. They were her primary means of self defense and also held her materia. There was no way she was working without them. Not when she was clothed and especially if she was naked.

With trembling hands, she slid the suspenders holding her skirt up off of her shoulders. The garment fell to the flood softly, revealing the black spats she wore underneath. She wore the skirt loose. It wasn't there for modest, that's what the spats were for, but for looks. A vestige of the pugilist's femininity. It also served another purpose. The lower body workouts she did as part of her martial arts training gave her a butt that she always felt was too big. The pleated skirt helped hide this fact.

Next, she kick of her boots, leaving her stockings in. In one swift motion, like ripping off a bandage, she pulled her spats and panties down and stepped out of them. The feeling of air on her exposed lower half was foreign and embarrassing. The sensation created a flurry of butterflies in her stomach. She was only halfway stripped in privacy and she was already queasy. How was she going to pull this off?

She had agonized the night prior about her pubic hair. She normally kept things trimmed and "under control," but that wouldn't cut it if she was going to be...on display. She eventually decided that a full shave would be too much and settled on a small landing strip.

Her hands fully quaking now, she rolled one of her stockings down and stepped back into her boot, then repeated the process with the other leg. The floor boards of 7th Heaven were already in bad shape when she gathered them from a scrap heap, and time had not been kind to them. Tonight was already going to be bad enough. She didn't need to add picking splinters out of her feet on top.

Awkwardly, with her hands and fingers nearly totally out of her control, she pulled off her white tank top. Exhaling, she pulled the black sports bra she wore underneath up and over her head. Her large, heavy breasts fell our, slapping loudly in the quite room against her ribs. Unlike most other large breasted women she talked to, she didn't mind her's all that much. The worst part about the girls was how sweat they would get when fighting. Otherwise, her sports bras kept them strapped down and out of the way, and her workouts kept her back muscles strong.

What she did mind was they way other people reacted to them. Openly staring. Talking to them instead of her. The comments when people though she couldn't hear you knew that she could. Maybe, Tifa thought in forced optimism, this would be good for everyone. Get an eye full so they could get it out of their system.

Now naked except for her gloves and shoes, Tifa was as ready as she would ever be. If this was her way of supporting AVALANCHE from the sidelines, she was going to start going on missions.
111211.title: No Backing Out Now

1112111.content:
Timidly, Tifa opened the door of the store room and poked her head out into the bar. It was empty, she knew that, and she had made sure to close the shutters so no one could peak in. But she still needed to reassure herself there was no one inside to see her.

Cautiously, she took a step out onto the bar floor. It felt so..wrong. She was no stranger to moving around naked. Often times, when she got home for the evening, she would take her top and bra off and let herself enjoy the fresh air and feeling of freedom. And there were times where she didn't bothered to get dressed after bathing if she knew she had know where to be for the day.

But this was different. She wasn't supposed to be naked here. Instead of feeling relaxed and liberated, her nerves were twisted into a bundle, ready to burst. The bounce and sway of her hefty breasts and the juggling of her butt as she walked felt obscene. The fact that she was still wearing her boots and gloves somehow made her display seem more lewd to her. Wearing the articles, there was no mistaking that she was naked on purpose.

Again, she slowly cracked to front door to the bar open and poked just her eyes out. She spotted a tuft of gray hair leaning against the railing of the front porch.

"Rady to get this show on the road?" Marle didn't turn around as she spoke. Tifa has asked to collect cover charges, a first for 7th Heaven, tonight. She knew things were going to get rowdy, but she also knew that if anyone could keep things under control it was Marle. She may be old, but she was deeply respected in the community. And everyone knew they considered each other family. If anything happened to one, there would be hell to pay from the other.

"Y...yeah," Tifa breathed out quietly. "Marle, I'm sorry-"

"You don't have to apologize for anything." Tifa watched her gray hair sway as she shock her head. "Times are hard. Well, times are always hard I suppose, but times are especially hard now. I might not always approve, but I would never begrudge a woman for doing what she hast to to get by. Besides, if you're going to do something like this, I rather you do it here, at you're own bar with me, than at some seedy back alley in Wall Market."

"Marle," Tifa's voice cracked, tears threatening. She somehow felt even worse about tonight that she already did. She had lied to Marle. She didn't tell her anything about her involvement with AVALANCE. Instead, she told her she was going to lose the bar if she didn't come up with a lot of cash, fast.

"Chin up." "Marle's voice was soft and reassuring. "No one wants to see a pretty girl cry. Especially one they are paying to ogle. And if they do, they aren't the kind of guys you want coming."

"Right." Tifa took a deep breath and calmed herself. "Thank you, again."

"Now lets get on with it." The old woman picked up a large tin can off the ground, her collections jar, and put it next to her on the railing. "If you put it off any longer I'm afraid the anticipation might kill you."

Tifa nodded and retreated into the bar. It took her a full minute to summon the courage to command her hand to flip the switch on the wall. The neon signs all over the building buzzed to bright life, declaring Tifa's 7th Heaven open for the night.
1112111.title: Time to Open

11121111.content:
As soon as the switch flipped up, Tifa ran from the door like it was on fire, her breasts clapping softly with the sudden, rapid movement. Not bothering to flip the door to behind the bar up, she vaulted over it.

And she waited. And waited. And waited.

She could hear the clock on the wall ticking in her skull. Goosebumps creeped over her body. Merle was right, this wait was going to kill her.

"Cover charge?" Tifa literally jumps when she heard voices outside. "Since when?" It was a man's voice.

"Since now," She heard Marle slap the wall of the bar where a flyer for tonight's even was posted. "Can't you read?"

"Shit, you serious?" A different man spoke. Fantastic, Tifa thought. Couldn't be just one person to start things off. "I thought that was some kind of prank!"

"Prank or not, you're not getting in without the cover charge." Marle patted her tin can, and Tifa head gil clatter to the bottom.

This is really happening! Tifa's mind was close to short circuiting. She fumbled with her arms, trying to figure out how to stand. Normally, she would stand behind the bar with her hands on her hips and greet her patrons. It was both welcoming, and commanding. But doing that would put her completely on display. She wanted to use her arms to cover her breasts, but that was pointless. And crossing her arms underneath would only serve to accentuate them. So she just stood there, ramrod stiff, gripping the counter with white knuckles.

The front doors opened. Two men that Tifa recognized entered. They were regular from the area. They were scrappers. They collected useful things from the scrap heap and sold them in town.

"Holy shit." One of them breathed. They were rooted in place, just a few steps inside, staring. Their eyes practically falling out of their heads.

There it is, Tifa winced. The first time someone seems me naked and it these two, and I'm doing it for money.

"G-good evening!" Tifa's voice was shaky as she attempted a smile. Her eyes burned, fighting back tears of humiliation. "What'll it be?"

Neither of them spoke. The just continued to ogle her. Tifa could practically feel their eyes on her chest. While the bar hid her lower half from view, which she was thankful for, that meant that there was nothing, not even a distraction, to hide her breasts.

"Beer!" The word fell out of one of their mouths, as if it took all of his brain power to form the single syllable. Cautiously, as if it were a trap, they walked forward.

"Coming right up!" She was relieved to have something to do other than stand there for them, and even happier that it have her a reason to turn around, even though that meant that they would now get an unobstructed view of her butt instead. She grabbed two bottles, she knew their brand already, and turned back around to their hungry gaze.

She tried to pop the top off with her gloved hand, but her hands were so shaky that she dropped the bottle. Luckily, it didn't break, glass bottles were tougher than the movies made them look, but the fumble added another layer of embarrassment to the normally adept bartender.

"Here you go," Tifa handed the drinks over. "That'll be 50 gil."

This was the part about the job Tifa always dreaded. This was the slums, everyone was some shade of poor. But even then, you paid for your goods and services. Yet everyone thought that they could just put their drinks on their tabs. Tabs that they would never pay. She had to cut off so many patrons due to their tabs, and these two in front of her were notoriously cheap.

But to her surprise, they handed over the money. No protest, just payment. Tifa was thankful for the small blessing.
11121111.title: First Customers

111211111.content:
Marle had been right, the anticipation really had been killing her. It reminded her of when she started training to fight. She dreaded the day that she would get punched. Really punched. Not with boxing gloves, but a real, bare knuckle blow. She even had nightmares about it. Then it happened. Yes, it had been awful, but not nearly as bad as she had been building it up to be in her imagination.

She was very much not happy with her current situation, but, if she was being perfectly honest, it wasn't as bad as she was dreading it would be these last few days. It was deeply embarrassing, more than a bit humiliating, and she was absolutely ashamed of herself for doing it even if it was for a cause she believed in. But it wasn't fatally embarrassing. She feared that if she went through with it, she would drop dead at the first customer.

And she had gone though with it! She knew it was an incredibly stupid thing to be proud of, like the idiots who bragged about winning drinking contests after she had to Esuna them off of the floor, ginning like idiots even though they nearly drank themselves to actual death. But she couldn't deny that there was a small part of her, the stubborn and competitive part of her, that was proud she hadn't backed down from the challenge.

The scrappers were downright bashful, which amused Tifa. They were turned away from Tifa, trying to talk about their day and plans for tomorrow, but it was a stilted and awkward conversation. Not that Tifa was any better. She would catch their eyes glancing at her, and every time if felt like a physical force. Occasionally, the would turn to her, to openly stare and to also attempt to include her in the conversation, and she really wish they wouldn't. Her tongue tripped over itself as her fried brain tried to find anything to say about the conversation she could barley hear over the sensation of being naked.

"Holly molly, they're even BIGGER when they're out!" Tifa looked up as the doors swung open. She knew there would be more people here tonight, but she had held onto a fools hope that she could get through the evening quietly. It was one of the town drunkard and his bum friends, laughing and elbowing each other as they ogled the nude bartender.

Bum was a harsh term. Real jobs were scarce in Sector 7. But there was always something that needed done. Building to repair, trash to clean up, monsters to fight. These men did none of that. If they applied themselves, some might even throw a few gil their way so they wouldn't put everything on their "tab,' which to them just mean free drinks.

"Welcome to 7th Heaven." Tifa faked a smile. "Got gil tonight?" The thin veneer of hospitality in her voice melted away as she scowled. If she was going to put on a show, she was damn sure getting paid for it.

"Easy there, missy!" The leader of the pack raised his hands in surrender. Tifa was glad that her red-eyes carried enough power still to distract from her bare breasts and intimidate. Everyone who patronized 7th Heaven knew that Tifa wasn't afraid to throw someone out, sometimes literally. The bum held up a pouch of gil. the coins jingling against each other. "We worked out asses off today. We weren't going to miss this for the world!"

"Good." Tifa wasn't sure how she felt about her skin being such a strong motivator. "Take a seat. What'll you have?" She asked, looking for anything to busy her hands with and distract her from the fact that was totally naked in a room filling up with men.
111211111.title: More Patrons

1112111111.content:
"Can I get a cocktail?" Someone asked, their voice barely able to cut over the chatter that filled the crowded bar.

"Coming right up!" Tifa shouted back. When she had hoped she would stay busy to help distract her from her nudity, she didn't expect this. The place was packed. All the seats at the bars and tables were filled and people were sitting on pinball machines and windowsills, with just as many more milling around.

She loathed to admit it, but Jessie had been right all along. This was the busiest 7th Heaven had ever been by orders of magnitudes. She was making money hand over fist, and she felt intensely guilty about it, as if her shame wasn't enough. These people didn't have a lot. She felt like she was taking them for a ride with as much money they were throwing at her. But then again, they came here on their own free will. If she was going to debase herself, at least the reward was great.

She poured the liquor into the mixer and began to shake it. Normally, she would spin a twist and put on a little show as she mixed, flipping the mixer up into the air and behind her back. But her hands were too unsteady to even attempt that. It would take more time for her to get used to bar-tending naked before she would be able to do that. Not that I will, Tifa quickly cut that line of thinking off.

But even doing simple shakes caused her breasts to wobble and bounce together. And everyone stared, openly. She could feel a new wave of heat wash over her already red face as the stares of dozens focused on her jiggling bare chest. Slamming the shaker down, half has a way to vent some frustration and half to make sure it didn't slip out of her hand, she poured out and slid the finished drink to the customer.

"Hey, can we get another round over here!" Someone at the table in the corner farthest from the bar waved.

"Sure thing!" Tifa answered reflexively, her customer service instincts not totally, only mostly, overrun by raw embarrassment. She cursed under her breath. She should have made them come up for their drinks.

Mumbling to herself, she turned her back to the bar and to the shelf of drinks behind the counter. The table asking for refills was drink beer our of the tap. She lined up six clean mugs and filled them up. She then took a few deep breaths to stop her from hyperventilating, then walked out onto the bar floor, three mugs in each hand.

So here I am, Tifa though as her feet ground to a halt. This was her first time stepping out from behind the bar that night. With the counter top to shield her, she could pretend that she was just topless. But now, she was totally exposed. Everyone stopped talking and turned to look. She took a few steps, but her legs felt like gelatin and it took all of her willpower to quite the tumult of butterflied in her stomach threatening to bring up bile.

The walk to the table felt like an eternity. The heavy footfalls of her boots echoed though the now silent bar and sent shock-waves up her body, causing her butt to jiggle and breasts to sway. It was so quite, Tifa, and she was sure everyone else, could hear the faint slapping of skin against skin as her breasts bobbed and bounced.

The walk gave her time to really see who was here tonight. She recognized nearly every face. Shop keepers, construction workers, teachers, vagrants, it seemed like everyone in Sector 7 turned out to get an eyeful of her. It was somewhat flattering, Tifa would never say out loud, so see so many people turn out just for her. Tifa was surprised to see that there were a fair number of women in the sea of faces, not just men. And the women stared just as intently. She didn't know how she felt about that.

After the walk across the bar, which felt like it took centuries, she made it to the table, where she put down the the mugs of alcohol. She kept her back straight and bent at the knees to lower herself. She didn't have the guts to dangle her breasts in their faces.

As she placed the last mug down, a loud, sharp slap echoed though the bar. Someone just slapped her ass. With honed, predatory like reflexes, she spun around before the offending hand had barley left her skin. She grabbed the culprits wrist. He screamed in pain as she twisted. She could feel bones snapping under her super human strength, augmented by her righteous fury.

With the molester in front of her now, she delivered a kick square into the center of his chest. He sailed out of the double doors of 7th Heaven's entrance, and continued to fly though the air for several feet until he skidded to at stop, and crumbled heap at the end of a dust trail.

"Anyone else feeling frisky!" Tifa barked, breaking heavily, teeth gritted. She looked around the room. No one was looking at her now. On the other side of the swinging double doors, Tifa caught a gimps of Marle, grinning widely and giving her a thumbs up.
1112111111.title: Standing Room Only

11121111111.content:
Tifa wasn't sure how to describe how she was feeling after her show of force. Throwing out the molester had been a good way for her to vent her frustration, which had been threatening to boil over all evening. But she would have much rather the violation had never happened in the first place. But the violence had quieted some of the more unsavory behavior of her patrons. The lewd staring, talking about her body as if she weren't attached to it, and cat calls. "Can we get some refills?" Tifa perked up at the sound of a woman's voice. She had been leaning against the counter behind the bar top. The posture caused her breasts to dangle beneath her, but it also hid them. Straightening her back and exposing herself to the room again, she grabbed a bottle of wine and a few bottled beers and ventured out from the mild modesty the behind the bar provided her.

"Was of damn time is what that was!" Tifa froze as the sound of the approaching voice. A voice was unmistakably and undeniably Barrett's! But that's not possible. Jessie got them out of the Sector for the night! The stress of the evening must be finally getting to her.

"More dead Shinra goons is never a bad thing." And that was Biggs!

Tifa's mind raced faster than her body could keep up. She stood, rooted in place, in the middle of the bar floor, staring at the entrance like an animal into oncoming headlights. In walked the AVALANCHE men, with Jessie chasing after them, hands outstretched like she was trying to grab them and pull them back. And just over Barrett's should, she could see a head of spiked blonde hair.

The men stopped in their tracks, mouths agape. And Tifa screamed. She flung her hands against her body in a vain attempt to cover herself, sending the bottles she was carrying flying in opposite directions across the room.

"A little late for that, isn't it?" Someone in the bar laughed, and everyone else joined in as Tifa's head spun while her best friends stared at her naked body.
11121111111.title: Familiar Faces

111211111111.content:
"What in the goddamn..." Barret breathed. Tifa straightened herself. That person had been right, she looked beyond ridiculous trying to cover herself. She felt beyond ridiculous.

"W-welcome to 7th H-h-heaven." Tifa's voice wavered as her friends stared at her bare form. "Please take a seat. Jessie?" Her voice was firm now. "You you mind giving me a hand with drinks?" It wasn't a question.

Jessie followed followed Tifa back towards the bar while the men shuffled off to a table. Jessie let out a small help when Tifa's hand grasped tightly onto her arm.

"I tried!" Jessie squeaked as Tifa's grip tightened, her red eyes boring holes into the girl. "But the warehouse wasn't very well guarded. We cleaned things out in half the time I thought it would take-eeek!" The metal armor on Jessie's arm started to bend under Tifa's fingers. "I really tried, I promise! But you know how Barret can get sometimes." Jessie tried to twist her body out of Tifa's grasp but she wasn't able to escape. "He wanted to wrap things up to see Marlene!" That finally got Tifa to release her hold. She could be embarrassed, and humiliated, and mortified, but she couldn't be mad about Barret wanting to see his daughter.

"Another round over here!" Someone called out.

Tifa sighed, revealed for any reason not to go over and face her friends. She grabbed a few bottles of beer and shoved them into Jessie's arms.

"I'll explain everything to them." Jessie offered a smile. "And besides, they were going to find out sooner or later. Not like you could have kept this a secret." Jessie turned and hurried off. Tifa knew that, but that didn't mean that had to see it! After attending to the table's drinks, she turned and made her slow death march to her friends.

"I...," Barret started when she arrived. They were all standing ramrod stiff, facing each other and not her. "I appreciate your sacrifice for the cause."

"Jessie filled us in," Biggs said. "This is probably the most courageous thing any of us have done, if I'm being honest."

"I promise we'll find a way to make it up to you." Wedge bowed, in spirit to Tifa but in reality to Cloud, who was seated across from him. Tifa couldn't help the small smile forming on her lips.

"Say something, soldier boy." Barret elbowed Cloud, who sat next to him. "Or do we have to pay you for that too?"

"I...uh." Cloud stammered, and Tifa caught a quick flick of his eyes towards her. That small, almost imperceptible movement hit Tifa like a lightning bolt. For a brief moment, a pleasurable excitement washed over her, overriding her anxious embarrassment. Tifa took a deep breath to calm herself.

"If you really want to make it up to me." Tifa unconsciously put her hands on her hips. "Then put all this money to good use."
111211111111.title: Jessie Explains

1112111111111.content:
"I don't think that'll be too hard." Jessie looked around, obviously over her shoulder so she turned her head away from Tifa. "It looks like you made a killing tonight. I've never seen this place so full before!"

"A victim of my own success." Tifa's eye twitched.

"You do this a couple more times and you'd be set for life!" Jessie gave her a thumbs up. "I don't think anyone would mind if this became a regular thing."

"You'd get my money!" A slurred voice called out from behind her.

"I'd come every time!" Someone else shouted.

"You're already here every day." A voice retorted and get a chuckle from the crowd.

"Clothes don't do you justice." Another person said, more inebriated than the first. "You should be naked more often!"

"Aye! I'll give you 10% off in my story for every piece of clothes you take off!" Tifa whipped around. That was the item shop owner. She went there multiple times a weeks, sometimes more than once a day!"

"Naked Tifa eats free!" That was a food cart owner. Did she expect her to strip down in public for a free meal?

"No gym fees if you work out in the buff!" The gym owner was here too? She went there nearly every other day!

It all hit her like a blow to the gut. People were here that she would see tomorrow, and the day after. There was no escaping tonight. This wasn't some one off thing that she could pretend didn't happen.

Tifa felt light headed and the implications set in. The room started to spin around her as her ears will filled with a room of drunks chanting "naked Tifa" and bounding the tables.
1112111111111.title: Jessie's Big Mouth

11121111111111.content:
Tifa's legs shook then gave out. She was weightless for a moment, then came crashing down into a pair of arms. Cloud had caught her before she hit the ground. She was acutely aware of the rough leather of his gloves and his prickly sweater against her skin. Tifa was also acutely aware that she was naked in Cloud's arms, and he was staring at the ceiling.

On the one hand, was happy that Cloud was trying to be respectful to the last shreds of dignity that Tifa pretended she still held onto. But there was part of her, a larger part of her than she wanted to knowledge, that remembered how good just that small, quick glance from him had made her feel. And that part of her wanted to grab his face and make him look.

Ninja and materia thief extraordinaire Yuffie Kisaragi was always known as a bit of a wild card. Even in a team of people brought together by odd circumstances and twists of fate, Yuffie's story behind joining the party was unusual. Defeated and outsmarted, the ninja found herself following Cloud and the others on their journey to save the world. Granted, she initially did so to eventually steal their materia at a later date, but even that ended up with the materia returned and Yuffie still tagging along.

Indeed, Yuffie's biggest failing was likely that she was too confident in her skills. She was certainly no amateur, but she wasn't an absolute master of her craft, and her ego could undermine her skills and lead to mistakes from time to time. 131.content:
Yuna was born into a world of strict spirituality and perpetual death punctuated by brief periods of peace. Every decade (give or take a few years) a monstrous entity known as Sin would arise to cut a path of destruction across the face of Spira. According to the Precepts of Yevon, Sin was a punishment brought upon the world for a time of decadence and the use of forbidden machines known as Machina. Fortunately, devout adherents of Yevon known as Summoners could make a journey and gather magical entities known as Aeons to battle Sin and its minions. Yuna knew very well what the cost of this pilgrimage was. Her father, Braska, had summoned the final Aeon ten years ago, losing his own life in the process yet banishing Sin for a time in the process. Yuna had made peace with sacrificing her life for the sake of the world, ready to die to bring about even a brief peace. The companions she made on her journey were far less comfortable with the idea. Her cousin Rikku (part of a tribe of heretics who used and tinkered with the ancient Machina) and her lover Tidus (a man who claimed to be from a time before Sin had ever existed, as well as the son of her father's guardian Jecht) were especially adamant and desperate to find another path. Their pleading and questioning led eventually to the truth- Sin was the "armor" of the ghost of Yu Yevon, the founder of the corrupt faith that controlled Spira. Every cycle Yu Yevon came to possess the body of the Final Aeon that killed the previous Sin, molding it into the next Sin to rise anew. With that revelation Yuna refused to receive the Final Aeon, and killed the guardian who would provide the summoning for good measure. With a new resolve, she and her guardians confronted and defeated Sin with their own strength, breaking the cycle and ushering in the Eternal Calm. In the process, Tidus was revealed to be a memory of the Aeons, a dream given flesh that would vanish with the death of Yu Yevon.

In the wake of her victoy, Yuna abandoned the path of the summoner and took up Sphere hunting with her cousin Rikku and the mysterious woman named Paine. Their search sought to uncover the secrets of Spira long hidden by the church of Yevon. In the process Yuna hoped to find a way to restore Tidus to the world of the living or come to terms with his disappearance and find a path for herself (facing for the first time the prospect of a long life over an act of martyrdom).

In all ages Yuna is a rather shy and unassuming girl, who demonstrates a streak of mischievous fun every now and again. This sense of fun comes with a desperate edge, however. She knows that her life ends with her journey, and thus wants to have as much fun with her few remaining days as she possibly can. She has no love of making waves or standing out, making her situation very awkward as she is the High Summoner's daughter and therefore famous even before her journey begins. This shyness should not be confused with a weak will. Yuna has resigned herself to death for the sake of the world she loves, and will complete her journey no matter what. This in turn, however, does not mean she won't be mortified to find herself naked in her travels. It simply means that she will press on with or without her clothes, determined to complete her journey even at the cost of her own dignity. As a summoner she wears a fairly conservative outfit compared to many natives of Spira (especially the tropical islands and dry inner continents with their hot summers). Her preferred dress consists of a black boots, a full length skirt colored a dark blue with a series of white patterns giving the impression of star filled sky. The top of her outfit consists of a white fabric wrapped across her chest and over her shoulders. The whole ensemble is held together with a bright yellow sash tied into a large bow in back. One can speculate that this outfit works like a kimono, in which case if the sash were removed the outfit would fall to pieces.

After the events of FF10 Yuna loosens up considerably. No longer chaffing under the rigors of Yevon's teachings, Yuna is visibly more carefree and whimsical. However, she remains unassuming and relatively shy. Worth noting is that Yuna has patently refused to take up the reigns of politics despite the vacuum left by the church of Yevon. She remains uncomfortable with her new celebrity status, which has reached obsessive levels after permanently defeating Sin. Despite this, she will occasionally use her popularity to make public appearances and rally the citizens of Spira to prevent wars or simply raise morale in uncertain times. She sports a good deal more skin than before, possibly at the insistence of her cousin Rikku (who, in either FFX or FFX-2 bares the most flesh of any of the characters). Her thigh high boots remain the same, but her modest skirt has been replaced by a billowy "half-skirt" of light blue fabric that does nothing to hide her long pretty legs. Beneath it she wears a pair of short shorts that don't quite provide enough material to hide the curve of her ass cheeks. A brown leather belt with a satchel contains her items and equipment, as well as the holsters to her weapons of choice, a pair of magical pistols. All that covers her upper half is an extremely tight corset like item of white fabric exposing a generous amount of cleavage and leaving her shoulders and arms bare. Across her chest she wears a symbol in memory to her lost lover. Her hair is braided into two knots, one a hold over from her Summoner days, the other a sweeping new addition that somehow comes almost to her knees. One final note- although this is her typical "sphere hunting" apparel, she and her companions have a magical "garment grid" that allows them to change clothes and costumes at will. One wonders what might happen if the grid malfunctioned or a "dress sphere" was introduced that had not been uploaded with an outfit yet. But surely nothing like that would ever happen!

131311.content:
Strange how life works out, isn't it?

From her youngest years Yuna had never been comfortable with spectacle or big crowds. While the utter adoration she received in her home village was vaguely flattering (and intimidating) Yuna had never been one to milk a crowd or use her public image for her own game. For one thing large groups gathering in one place was a magnet for Sin. For another, the reputation of Lord Braska had always felt like a hindrance for her...something more she needed to overcome in order to stake her own claim to life and earn a proper name for herself. That contrast set her apart from the other, more corrupt elements of Yevon, which made her all the more beloved by the people. That certain individuals, like Seymour, had tried to use her like an object for their own political games (she still remembered the way her image in that skimpy dress had been broadcast all across Spira as a show of Seymour's truimph) had made her all the more skittish.

It was pure chance that she happened to have a rather good singing voice. The first big concert hadn't even been her at all. A rival Sphere Hunter named La Blanche had stolen her dress sphere and effectively used her image to promote a concert and sell her own merchandise. It had somewhat spooked and galled her how many people had shown up for the event. She had hoped that avoiding politics and (almost literally) running away from the public spotlight would dampen her appeal after the victory over Sin. Apparently the opposite was true. Her apparent shyness regarding the public had combined with her celebrity status and hero worship to make Spira downright obsessed with her. That she had carefully hidden a rather attractive little body under those modest robes for so many years (apparently equipped with a much more generous figure than any had suspected, to say nothing of her tight stomach and cute little butt!) and remained single and presumably chaste like a good little Yevon girl even after the collapse of Yevon only heightened Spira's adoration and fascination. To her chagrin, the promise of an appearance by Lady Yuna, the savior of Spira and bringer of the Eternal Calm, was an instant draw for people all over the world.

As it happened, Yuna herself had had to take advantage of that very popularity to prevent a war. She had gathered an even larger crowd in the Thunder Plains and performed a lovely song inspired by a long dead kindred spirit desiring to serenade a lover who met a tragic end.

The concert had been a success and likely saved the world all over again. But it had certain consequences. One of those was the constant hounding Yuna received to promote one event or another. She had flatly refused at first. But the beggars had become more and more clever. "Blitzball is a sacred tradition! It gave the people hope in the face of Sin's despair! It kept the world united over a thousand years! And the game has always had a Maester to mark the opening game of the season! But there aren't any more Maesters to be found! If the Lady Yuna won't come out, who will give honor to the players and continue the grand traditions holy and otherwise that saw Spira through the harsh times?"

Sacrifice your personal anxieties for the good of the world. Yes, they had certainly learned how to push her buttons. So here she was, standing up on a gaudy floating platform in the middle of an enormous stadium, a hundred dancing lights illuminating her, decked out in her songstress uniform, a jumbotron giving an upclose view of her dancing and singing. Surprisingly, La Blanche had been all too happy to volunteer her resources to the cause. That it would necessitate her rival's particularly...showy brand of showmanship was just another sacrifice Yuna made for the sake of the event. The good news was that she was doing a decent job of performing, and even the few times she tripped over the words to her song or missed a dance step the audience didn't seem to notice or care! Yuna gasped as she again felt herself penetrated from behind.

"W-What is with you both and my butt??" She wailed.

"....the shorts." They both proclaimed in unison.

"The...the shorts were your idea!!" Yuna moaned in pleasure and mock outrage at Rikku.

"Well....yeah....C-Crush on my cousin!" Rikku responded.

"Is it really our fault? You have a magnificent ass. Of course we want to claim it!" Paine whispered, slapping Yuna's cheek before thrusting in ernest.

"I'm sorry to interrupt here...." came Le Blanche's mocking voice over the comm link.

"Wha-" Yuna gasped.

"I thought you might still be in the middle of something. But I don't have much time. Yuna has a lot to do, after all." Le Blanche said.

"What are you....you said you'd save my reputation!" Yuna snapped.

"Oh, I am. I've crafted a very careful cover story that explains how a group of perverted impostors are running around Spira masquerading as a naked version of the Gullwings! I've even requested that they be punished in a nonviolent but doubly humiliating way to pay them back for the shame they have caused me. And by me, I of course me Lady Yuna." Le Blanche said.

"WHAT?" Yuna asked.

"Paine is right. You are slow. I've made my own dress sphere, dummy. Me and the boys are onboard your ship right now, pretending to be you three. You 'kidnapped' us and tried to take our places to humiliate us. Sorry, to humiliate the Gullwings. The fact that the alleged criminals are actually the real Gullwings and the supposed real Gullwings are just impostors....heh heh. That's our little secret." Le Blanche said.

"You can't expect-"

"Of course I can! If you admit it, you have to admit that every act of humiliation you performed at that concert (not to mention whatever misadventures you get up to NOW!) was really all you! Your actual reputation only stays safe as long as everyone thinks I'm you. So, too bad, so sad! All your spheres? Mine now! All your money? Mine! Your ship? Your crew? Your lives? MIne mine mine!! Oh, and in case it needs saying, all your clothes belong to me now too! Guess in the end the Le Blanche Syndicates get to live the high life while you get to live as impoverished, naked, slutty fugitives hunted by your old fans! Sound good? Glad you think so too!"

"You can't...you can't just LEAVE us like this!!" Yuna said.

"Can't I? And don't be melodramatic! Your perverted poltergeist....pervertogeist....may insist you stay naked and shame yourselves if you have an audience....but she isn't cruel. You are all allowed to defend yourselves if the situation turns violent. Full access to your weapons and abilities and everything! And who was it that took out Sin and Vegnagun again? Yep, in a fight you'll own any fiend or creepo that might threaten you. And you all have enough survival skills to hunt and camp and survive just fine out in the wilderness. So no whining, Dullwings. Your lives are perfectly safe. Its only in every other conceivable way that I've utterly and completely beaten you three! Anyway, I think I'll get back to swimming in your sphere collection while I watch the news about your debauched escapades! Enjoy your new life as paupers and sex crazed criminals! Bye now!" Le Blanche cackled.

There was a brief silence as the mortifying situation sunk in. Then Yuna found herself doing what her unsent passenger did best, play out her confused state of embarrassment and arousal in the most debauched way possible. As one the three began to hump as if they had just invented the activity.

132.content:
Energetic and kind-hearted, brilliant alchemist and chemist Rikku serves as a major foil to the more stoic members of Yuna's pilgrimage group. Her sunny disposition can be starkly contrasted with the rare occasions she falls to her insecurities and fears, unsure of what to do with her future. While on Yuna's pilgrimage, Rikku looks up to the level-headed Lulu as a role model, a position she takes up for Yuna after the two become sphere hunters.

As an Al Bhed, Rikku is skilled with the use of machina, and is known to tinker with machines that she finds to hopefully gain a better understanding of them. Of course, even if she doesn't know what she's working on, that doesn't stop Rikku from forging on ahead, regardless of the consequences. Sure, this might come back to bite Rikku one day, but Rikku doesn't dwell on that thought, instead acting as if there was no danger.

Little did Rikku know just how horrible her day was about to become. Perhaps she'd have reconsidered her plans, stayed in bed, or worn a full suit of armor welded shut. In any case, Rikku's day began to go wrong as she was-

15431.content: Where does Olette meet her embarrassing fate?
15431.title: Olette

choices: Hang out with Hayner and Pence
154311.content:
In easygoing Twilight Town, Olette was trying to decide what she wanted to do today. Idly twirling her hair, the cute and happy-go-lucky girl was quietly weighing her options.

She was wearing her typical summer outfit, consisting of an orange tank top, khaki capri pants, orange socks, and a pair of cream, yellow, and black tennis shoes. She also wore a couple of accessories: a blue bracelet and a black necklace with a small blue charm.

She could hang out with her friends Hayner and Pence like she usually did, or she could do something less typical and find something to do on her own.

What will she do?
154311.title: Twilight Town

1543112.content: She could always take a walk around town, enjoy the weather, and see if anything interesting happens.
1543112.title: Do something else

15431121.content: Does she find something to do? Or does something happen as she's walking?
15431121.title: Take a walk around town

1543112121.content:
As Olette walks through Twilight Town, she finds herself having a very pleasant time. The sun was shining, the air was balmy, and a small, warm breeze was blowing. This weather made is easy to enjoy being outside on a lazy summer afternoon. Her pace was slow, and she was only half paying attention. "Days like this are simply the best!" she thought happily.

On her way around town, she had already passed through the Tram Common and the Sandlot, and she was currently making her way into the back alleys and side streets that connect the Sandlot with Station Heights. Her and her friends' Usual Spot was located at the end of one of the alleys, but she was going her own way today.

In the shade of one of the alleys, a figure watches the girl lazily pass by. They grin and giggle. Stretching her fingers, the master thief emerges from the alley and trails behind the unsuspecting girl. With highly trained and sophisticated movements, the thief slides her fingers into each of Olette's pockets. After fishing out all the munny she could find, she took a few steps away to inspect her winnings. "Hmm, it's not much, but I'm sure that's all she had on her..." the thief muttered.

Olette, still oblivious to being pickpocketed, continued walking towards Station Heights, intending to make her way to the train station. However, she was still on the side streets at the moment. She noted that there weren't very many people out today. That wasn't too unusual to her though. On days like today, anyone who had plans were either at Sunset Terrace or the beach. That, and the side streets weren't used very much.

Somewhat disappointed with her haul, the thief had a small idea. She could steal more from Olette, or she could leave with just the munny.

What does she do?
1543112121.title: Master Thief

15431121211.content:
The thief had noticed that Olette was wearing both a necklace and a bracelet. "They might be valuable," she thought to herself. It would be risky, but you can't survive as a master thief without having uncanny ability and more than a few tricks up your sleeves.

"The easiest piece to remove would be the bracelet," the thief thought, as Olette was walking with her arms relaxed to her sides. Moving close and locating the clasp, she unfastened the small clasp and removed the bracelet from Olette's wrist in an instant. It was so smooth and quick that Olette didn't even notice.

"Next would be the necklace." Though this was slightly more tricky, she used the same technique and removed Olette's necklace without a single hint to Olette. Maybe Olette would have noticed something, but she was too preoccupied in enjoying the warm lazy summer afternoon.

"Well, that should be enough for a haul..." the thief thought. "But..."

The master thief looked at the back of the girl she had been stealing from. "This girl is incredibly easy to steal from... and I do need practice on my finest abilities..."
15431121211.title: Steal more

154311212111.content:
A mischievous smile split the thief's face and she giggled to herself. "This is going to be fun! It doesn't really matter if I'm caught either. I'm easily fast enough to do what I want. And I want to relieve this girl of her clothing." With her, albeit twisted, goal in mind, the thief approached yet again.

Unfortunately for Olette, she was completely oblivious to who was looming behind her and what was about to happen.

The first thing to go would be Olette's tank top. Through normal means, it would be impossible to remove that article of clothing without pulling it over her head, easily causing her to notice. However, the thief had a method ready. Whipping out a small, incredibly sharp blade, the thief crept close and got to work. With impossibly swift and fluid movements, the thief slashed through each of the tank top's shoulder straps. She then made a series of calculated cuts on the rest of Olette's tank top, and in a fraction of a second, the article of clothing was reduced to orange ribbons of fabric. As the pieces fell to the ground, Olette's plain white bra was exposed.

The big question is....did Olette notice?
154311212111.title: Steal even more

1543112121111.content:
As a testament to both the master thief's skill and Olette's blissful ignorance, the removal of the tank top went unnoticed. Olette continued on her way, now only wearing a white bra, khaki capri pants, orange socks, and creme, orange, and black shoes. The thief followed behind, ready for her next strike.

Olette noticed a message board on the wall of one of the buildings that lined the side street she was in. She walked up to it and began to study it. "Maybe they posted some odd jobs to do on here..." she mumbled to herself. Sensing an opportunity, the thief sprung into action. She got close to the ground and began tugging at the laces of Olette's shoes. Sliding the laces out and undoing the knots, the thief left Olette's shoes untied. To be sure they would come off, the thief reached into one of her many pockets and pulled out a small container of incredibly sticky tar. She lined the bottom of Olette's shoes with the tar, so the shoes were stuck fast to the ground.

Seeing as the girl was still standing and looking at the message board, the thief moved on to the next significant item of clothing. Her sights were set on Olette's pants. With an incredibly light and delicate touch, she reached around the girl's waist and set her fingers to work on undoing the fastenings. She slowly unbuttoned, and then unzipped. As the zipper reached its final clicks, the pants loosened and started to slip down. With unnatural skill, the thief guided the clothing off Olette's hips, slid it down her legs, and allowed it to pile around her shoes.

Satisfied with the odd jobs available to her, Olette continued on her way, stepping out of both her shoes and her pants in one fell swoop. The girl was now only clad in her plain white bra and panties and her orange socks.
1543112121111.title: No she didn't

choices: She continues to the station, unaware
She realizes she's naked in public
15431121211111.content:
With all of Olette's outer clothing removed, the only thing left was to remove her smaller, more intimate clothes. The thief, using her incredible speed and skill, cut, pulled, and undid all of Olette's clothing in one series of movements. Her bra was stripped off first, exposing her fair breasts. Then her underwear and socks came off at nearly the same time. Olette was now completely undressed...well and truly naked.

The thief giggled to herself once again. It was a job well done. She took a good long look to admire her work and then disappeared back into the alleys of Twilight Town.

Olette, on the other hand, finally made it to the main road of Station Heights. She is naked, so other people in the area will surely notice. However, does she herself notice yet?

1553.content: How about Bravely Default? A spin-off of the main Final Fantasy series, it retains many features such as the job system, while introducing the Brave and Default system its name is taken from. The story follows 4 adventurers, each with their own stake in the adventure, as they fight the forces of the Eternian Empire as they try to awaken the darkened Crystals, massive holy gemstones that maintain the balance of the natural world.
1553.title: Another game

15531.content:
And which character is going to endure an embarrassing ordeal on their way to save the Crystals?

Agnes Oblige- The Vestal of Wind; essentially, a priestess devoted to caring for one of the Four Crystals, and one of the exceptional few with the proper spirit and training to awaken a darkened Crystal, calling upon centuries of prayers to free the world from darkness. She's somewhat sheltered from spending most of her life in training with the other potential vestals, but despite the occasional naivete, she has strong convictions. Of course, these convictions sometimes lead to trouble- she's reluctant to involve others in problems she sees as her own responsibility, and she's slow to offer help when she can't see how it benefits her quest to save the Crystals. That naivety and reluctance to seek help may just come back to bite her as she finds herself bearing a baring burden... In combat, she's suited to magic or support oriented jobs.

Edea Lee- Daughter of the Grand Marshal of the Eternian Forces. Initially dispatched as a soldier, she soon finds herself disgusted with the cowardly and cruel commanders of her fathers army, and turns traitor to join the Vestal's party, though a part of her still struggles to reconcile her own sense of justice with the actions and creed of her countrymen. Strong willed and opinionated, her fiery temper serves her well in pursuing her goals. Of course, that temper, combined with a tendency to see the world in black and white, may lead her into further conflicts, especially should she wind up in a less-than-dignified situation... In battle, she's trained to use the sword, and leans towards jobs that give her just as much armor as attack strength.

Or do you want a different character, outside of the main 4 of the party?
15531.title: Bravely Default

155311.content:
Though she may have trouble raising her voice, the ideals and convictions of Agnes Oblige are as strong as they are crucial to the continued survival of the world. Of course, in this new, embarrassing situation she finds herself in, she might end up struggling to hold back a shriek, as this young holy woman winds up with her radiance on full display...

Is it another effort by the Eternain Forces to undermine the Crystal Orthodoxy? The Vestals are their most revered members; but if a Vestal winds up humiliated and nude, how seriously can anyone take their ideals. This Vestal in particular seems to have trouble with crowds, so she makes the perfect target for such a scheme...

Or is there a new Eternian Commander, possessing a very peculiar asterisk. The job and abilities it bestows on someone make them powerful, certainly, but the outfit itself is... somewhat negligent when it comes to cover. Not to mention the class's attacks all seemed aimed at one place; the targets modesty. From the battle itself to trying out the new job afterwards, dealing with this new threat is an embarrassing ordeal.

155332222.title: A different game

info.brief_description: The ladies of the Final Fantasy franchise find themselves subject to ENF situations.
info.description:
In this story, you will guide the path of one of the female characters of the Final Fantasy series as she experiences the most embarrassing day of her life. Through some series of events, the beauty in question finds herself stripped completely naked and far from safety and concealment. As her journey to restore her modesty and preserve her dignity goes on, you will decide just how successful she will be. Be as merciless as you please, with a few key exceptions.

Basic rules:
NO rape, gore, vore, scat, shrinking, growing, transformation, or the like.
As with my other stories, if the lady in question finds some way to cover herself, it should be sacrificed or lost within a few chapters; their road is a long one, and it certainly won't be easy.
